<S%G2532>He<s%> looked <S%G308>up,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G444>men;<s%> for I see them <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G1186>trees<s%> <S%G4043>walking.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G2532>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2968>villages<s%> of <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> <S%G5376>Philippi.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>On<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> he <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G3004><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> <S%G3004>do<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> that <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1511>am?<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1994>he,<s%> turning around, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>seeing<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Get <S%G3694>behind<s%> <S%G3450>me,<s%> <S%G4567>Satan!<s%> <S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G5217>you<s%> have in <S%G5426>mind<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>"
